short_summary: Public Service and Procurement Canada on behalf of CFIA has requirement to purchase Office Furniture
description: Procurement is for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture at
full_summary:
### Tender Notice
EZ899-250291 - Office Furniture - Canadian Food Inspection Agency, Sidney
#### Reference and Solicitation Information * Tender Reference Number: WS4619987641 * Solicitation Number: WS4619987641 * Amendment Number: 1 * Public Publication Date: June 14, 2024 * Tender Closing Date: June 25, 2024, at 14:00:00 #### Procurement Details * The tendered item is office furniture, UNSPC Code: *56101500 - Furniture* * Product categories of Suite 1: Site Services, Suite 2: Desktop Systems, Suite 3: Support Staff, Suite 5: PABX and Suite 6: Printers and Multi-Functional Devices #### Facilities and Logistics The office furniture will be installed at 8801 East Saanich Rd., North Saanich, Sidney, BC V8L 1H3. Installation timelines are as follows: - Category 1, 2, and 5: August 19 – 30, 2024 - Category 3 and 6: September 9 – 27, 2024 #### Procurement Method Competitive selective tendering. #### Contract Award Criteria Contract award shall be based solely on the lowest price proposal. #### Contact Information You may obtain comprehensive tender documents from the supplier’s website or by contacting: Mikulova, Kristina SPAC/PSPC kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca #### Notice URL Notice URL in English / avis URL en français Please refer to the notice URL for further information. ### Side Bar [Video Overview] [Map for trailer loading and unloading] [Verification Status] [Terminated Notice Label] This rewritten entry is structured with relevant information grouped neatly for easy access. New text that is grammatically correct and written in professional tone is displayed with a soft red filter for easy readability.
